name: @most/package-starter
description: A well-crafted starting place for mostjs packages.

scripts.build-dist: mkdir -p dist && rollup src/index.js | babel --presets es2015 --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd --module-id '@most/package-starter' -o dist/package-starter.js
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && uglifyjs dist/package-starter.js -o dist/package-starter.min.js
scripts.lint: jsinspect src && jsinspect test && eslint src test
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test

author: mostjs <you@whoever.com> (github.com/mostjs)
